fever.care: Drink plenty of fluids, take rest, and avoid cold foods.

cold.care: Drink warm fluids, take steam inhalation, and avoid cold drinks.

cough.care: Drink warm water, avoid cold beverages, and rest your throat.

headache.care: Avoid screen time, rest in a dark room, and drink enough water.

stomach pain.care: Avoid spicy food, eat small meals, and drink warm water.

diarrhea.dosage: Drink ORS after each loose stool, take 1 tablet if needed
diarrhea.cost: ₹40 per ORS packet, ₹30 per strip (10 tablets)
diarrhea.care: Stay hydrated, eat bland food, and avoid dairy.

vomiting.care: Drink lemon water, eat small meals, and avoid greasy food.

gas acidity.care: Avoid spicy food, drink cold milk, and eat smaller meals.

constipation.dosage: Take 1 spoon with warm water at night
constipation.care: Increase fiber intake, drink more water, and exercise regularly.

back pain.dosage: Apply gel twice daily, take a tablet if needed
back pain.cost: ₹60 per gel tube, ₹40 per strip (10 tablets)
back pain.care: Avoid heavy lifting, apply heat therapy, and do light stretching.

joint pain.care: Do mild exercises, eat calcium-rich foods, and avoid cold weather.

throat infection.care: Gargle with warm salt water, drink herbal tea, and rest.

eye infection.dosage: Use 2 drops in each eye 4 times daily
eye infection.care: Avoid touching eyes, use a clean towel, and wear sunglasses.

toothache.dosage: Apply clove oil to the tooth, take a tablet if needed
toothache.care: Avoid very hot/cold food, brush gently, and rinse with salt water.

skin allergy.dosage: Take 1 tablet at night, apply lotion twice daily
skin allergy.cost: ₹30 per strip (10 tablets), ₹80 per lotion bottle
skin allergy.care: Avoid scratching, wear loose cotton clothes, and stay hydrated.

burns.care: Keep the area clean, avoid sun exposure, and apply cool compress.

high blood pressure.care: Reduce salt intake, exercise regularly, and manage stress.

low blood pressure.dosage: Drink ORS, increase salt in diet
low blood pressure.care: Drink more water, avoid standing suddenly, and eat small meals.

diabetes.care: Control sugar intake, exercise regularly, and monitor glucose levels.

asthma.care: Avoid allergens, use a humidifier, and practice breathing exercises.

anemia.care: Eat iron-rich foods, take vitamin C, and avoid tea/coffee after meals.

depression.care: Exercise regularly, talk to loved ones, and practice mindfulness.
